entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-18
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • IDE0059 incorrectly triggers when assigning to the indexer of a value type #77258
  • IDE0079 triggering false positives on various suppressed diagnostics #75887
  • No error when using nameof(collection[index]). Instead the compiler crashes on build #77228
    17.14
  • Investigate cleanup of CachingSemanticModelProvider #77220
    Backlog
  • Implement nullable analysis for setters of properties using field keyword #77215
    .NET 10
  • "Rename failed to apply edits" after trying to rename classes in files opened after file operations #68565
    Backlog
  • Allow to change the behavior for interfaces for rule IDE0040: Accessibility modifiers required #77253

PullRequests

Created

  • Update System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe to 6.1.1 #77267
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update PublicAPI files for 17.13 ship #77266
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Merge main to runtime async branch #77265
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Update to release nuget packages #77261
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Emit extension implementation methods #77197
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Add initial runtime async spike #76121
    Area-Compilers, Needs API Review, Feature - Runtime Async
  • Add missing word the documentation file #77259
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Rework analyzer assembly loading #77004
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Warn for redundant pattern in `not ... or <redundant>` pattern #75581
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Collection expression arguments: support [CollectionBuilder] factory methods #76998
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix override completion when attribute below #77242
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix Quick Info nullability display for backing fields #77240
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Generate Documentation Auto-Insert #76665
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Sem search signature #74480
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • WIP: Initial work to support bulk renaming of files to match types contained within. #77239
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Extensions: Bind invocations and member accesses #77172
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything
  • Add Copilot UI prototype to Semantic Search window #77222
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Fix issues with source packages #77187
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77226
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Partial events and constructors: attributes #77182
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Partial Events and Constructors
